#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,l,p,d,o,m,n,x;
	cin>>x;
	while(x--)
	{
		int t=0;
		string s1,s2;
		cin>>s1;
        cin>>s2;
        j=0;
        for(i=0;i<s1.length();i++)
        {
        	if(s1[i]!=s2[j])
        	t++;
        	else
        	j++;
        	if(t>1)
        	break;
		}
		if(i==s1.length())
		cout<<"1"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"0"<<endl;
	}
}
